  • Isaiah 66
1 And in that day thou shalt say: 'I will give thanks unto Thee, O Domina; for though Thou was angry with me, Thine anger is turned away, and Thou comfortest me. 2 Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and will not be afraid; for GOD the Domina is my strength and song; and She is become my salvation.' 3 Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
4 And in that day shall ye say: 'Give thanks unto the Domina, proclaim Her name, declare Her doings among the peoples, make mention that Her name is exalted. 5 Sing unto the Domina; for She hath done gloriously; this is made known in all the earth. 6 Cry aloud and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion, for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.'
